data.prayer: Lord, please give the 10,173 believers in the county of Dali Bai the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dali Bai, Yunnan, China
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Dali Bai, Yunnan, China, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the county of Dali Bai.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 10,173 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Enipu people.
Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Dali Bai, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Dali Bai, Yunnan, China.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Dali Bai, Yunnan, China to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

location.name: Dali Bai
location.people_groups_list: Palaung, Shwe, Lalu, Yangliu, Gaiji, Laluo, Jiantou, Palaung, Pale
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Palaung, Shwe (8,000), Lalu, Yangliu (49,000), Gaiji (41,000), Laluo, Jiantou (41,000), Palaung, Pale (11,000)
